oshiSkill.name: 秩序の先駆者
oshiSkill.description: [1/Turn]When 1 of your holomem would take Arts damage from your opponent, you may choose 1 red [Buzz or 2nd] holomem on your stage:The chosen holomem takes the damage instead.

spOshiSkill.name: JUST LIKE THAT
spOshiSkill.description: [1/Game]Place 1 holomem with #Justice from your archive on stage. Then, send 1~5 cheers from your archive to that holomem.

oshiSkill.name: Boat Goes Binted
oshiSkill.description: [1/Turn]Switch your opponent's center holomem and collab holomem.

spOshiSkill.name: 自由奔放な『追跡者』
spOshiSkill.description: [1/Game]Reveal 2 2nd holomem <Gigi Murin> from your deck, and place them on stage. Then, shuffle the deck. Send 1 cheer from your archive to each of your holomem.

name: Elizabeth Rose Bloodflame
extraEffect: You may include any number of this holomem in the deck

name: Elizabeth Rose Bloodflame
giftEffect: For Justice! -ERB- : During your opponent's turn, when 1 of your holomem with #Justice is downed, send the top card of your cheer deck to this holomem. You may only use Gift "For Justice! -ERB-" once per turn.

skills.name: Lovely to See You, to See You, Lovely～♡

name: Elizabeth Rose Bloodflame
bloomEffect: Bring It On! : Choose 1 holomem with #Justice on your stage. During this turn, the chosen holomem gets Arts+20.

name: Elizabeth Rose Bloodflame
giftEffect: 猛炎のウォークライ: This holomem gets +10 HP for each of this holomem's cheers.

skills.name: 悪斬りのカデンツァ
skills.description: This Arts gets +20 for each of this holomem's cheers. When this Arts downed your opponent's holomem, send the top card of your cheer deck to this holomem.

name: Gigi Murin
collabEffect: For Justice! -GG- : Send 1 cheer from your archive to your holomem with #Justice.
extraEffect: You may include any number of this holomem in the deck

name: Gigi Murin
collabEffect: イタズラ増殖！: If you went second and it is your first turn, reveal 1 1st holomem with #Justice from your deck, and place it on stage. Then, shuffle the deck.

skills.name: 悪戯好きのグレムリン

name: Gigi Murin
bloomEffect: I am Gonathan G. : You may archive 1 Debut holomem that is stacked to this holomem:Deal 20 special damage to your opponent's collab holomem.

skills.name: すべての意味を追い求めて
skills.description: If there are no holomem stacked to this holomem, this Arts gets +20.

name: Gigi Murin
giftEffect: ご苦労さん！ : During your opponent's turn, when your back holomem would take special damage from your opponent, you may archive 1 holomem that is stacked to this holomem:During this turn, all of your back holomem do not take special damage.

skills.name: 負けるわけにはいかない

name: Gigi Murin
giftEffect: 再起のストレングス : [1/Turn]During your main phase, you may archive 1 holomem stacked to your <Gigi Murin>:Send the top card of your cheer deck to this holomem.

skills.name: 殻破りのライオット
skills.description: If there are no holomem stacked to this holomem, this Arts gets +90.

name: Cecilia Immergreen
giftEffect: 正義の旋律: [Center Position・Collab Position Only][1/Turn]When a [Debut holomem or Spot holomem] with #Justice is placed on your stage, draw 1 card.

skills.name: 紅茶をどうぞ！
skills.description: Send the top card of your cheer deck to your holomem with #Justice.

name: Raora Panthera
collabEffect: 正義の諧調 : You may return 1 cheer from your stage to the bottom of your cheer deck. If you do, reveal 1 cheer from your cheer deck and send it to your holomem. Then, shuffle the cheer deck.

skills.name: コーヒーをどうぞ！
skills.description: If your [center holomem and collab holomem] with #Justice have cheers of different colors attached, this Arts gets +20.

name: Justice
ability: This card can only be used if you have 6 or less cards in hand excluding this card. Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Reveal any number of holomem with #Justice from among them, and add the revealed holomem to hand. Then, return the remaining cards to the bottom of the deck in any order.

name: JUSTICE, JUST LIKE THAT!!!!
ability: This card can only be used if all holomem on your stage have #Justice. Choose 1 holomem on your stage. Return 1~2 holomem stacked to that holomem to hand. During this turn, the chosen holomem gets Arts+20 for each holomem returned by this effect.

name: Popo
ability: The holomem this mascot is attached to gets +20 HP. ◆Additional ability if attached to <Gigi Murin> If there are no holomem stacked to this holomem, this holomem gets Arts+20. Only 1 mascot can be attached to each of your holomem.
